```{r}
datapn$LWT <- datapn$LWT * 0.45359237
datapn$BWT <- datapn$BWT / 1000
```

```{r}
y <- datapn$BWT
x <- datapn$LWT
reg <- lm(y~x) 
summary(reg)
plot(x,y,col="red")
abline(reg,col="blue")
anova(reg)
df <- data.frame(56)
predict(reg,56)
```
